```{r}
#Define Functions
mkd_table <- function(err_data, title, subtitle) {
  {{err_data}}
  gt(err_data) %>%
  tab_header(
    title = md(title),
    subtitle = paste("Error Message: ", subtitle)
    ) %>%
  tab_options(
    heading.subtitle.font.size = 12,
    heading.align = "left",
    table.border.top.color = "white",
    column_labels.border.bottom.color = "black",
    table.align = "left",
    table.width = pct(100)
  )
  }
```
